zh-cn: 奥托·爱德华·利奥波德·冯·俾斯麦

description.zh-cn: 德国政治家、外交家，首任德意志帝国首相。因其“铁血政策”而被称为“铁血宰相”，通过一系列战争主导了德意志的统一。
description.en: A German statesman and diplomat, and the first Chancellor of the German Empire. Known as the 'Iron Chancellor' for his 'iron and blood' policy, he orchestrated the unification of Germany through a series of wars.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士国王及首任德意志皇帝。
description.en: King of Prussia and the first German Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 德意志皇帝兼普鲁士国王，在位仅99天。
description.en: German Emperor and King of Prussia, who reigned for only 99 days.

description.zh-cn: 末任德意志皇帝及普鲁士国王。
description.en: The last German Emperor and King of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国、北德意志邦联及普鲁士王国的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position for the German Empire, North German Confederation, and Kingdom of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 德国将军和政治家，接替俾斯麦成为德意志帝国第二任宰相。
description.en: German general and statesman who succeeded Bismarck as the second Chancellor of the German Empire.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士将军和政治家，曾短暂担任普鲁士首相。
description.en: Prussian general and statesman who briefly served as Minister President of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国哥廷根的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Göttingen, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国柏林的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Berlin, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国格赖夫斯瓦尔德的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Greifswald, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Otto von Bismarck.

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦的父亲，一位地主和传统容克。
description.en: Father of Otto von Bismarck, a landowner and traditional Junker.

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Otto von Bismarck.

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦的哥哥。
description.en: Older brother of Otto von Bismarck.

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦的长子，德国政治家。
description.en: Eldest son of Otto von Bismarck and a German politician.

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦的次子。
description.en: Second son of Otto von Bismarck.

description.zh-cn: 将数百个独立邦国统一为德意志帝国的政治和行政一体化过程。
description.en: The political and administrative integration of hundreds of independent states into the German Empire.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士和奥地利为争夺石勒苏益格和荷尔斯泰因而与丹麦发生的战争，是德国统一战争的第一场。
description.en: The first of the German unification wars, fought between Prussia and Austria against Denmark over the duchies of Schleswig and Holstein.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士与奥地利为争夺德意志邦联领导权而爆发的战争，是德国统一战争的第二场。
description.en: The second of the German unification wars, fought between Prussia and Austria for dominance over the German Confederation.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士与法兰西第二帝国之间的战争，是德国统一战争的最后一场，其结果是德意志帝国的建立。
description.en: The final of the German unification wars, fought between Prussia and the Second French Empire, which resulted in the creation of the German Empire.

description.zh-cn: 在普法战争胜利后，威廉一世在法国凡尔赛宫镜厅宣告德意志帝国成立的事件。
description.en: Following the victory in the Franco-Prussian War, Wilhelm I proclaimed the establishment of the German Empire in the Hall of Mirrors at the Palace of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第二共和国的唯一一位总统和法兰西第二帝国的唯一一位皇帝。
description.en: The only president of the French Second Republic and the only emperor of the Second French Empire.

position.zh-cn: 普鲁士王国首相, 北德意志邦联首相, 德意志帝国首相
position.en: Minister President of Prussia, Chancellor of the North German Confederation, Chancellor of the German Empire

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦长期担任普鲁士及统一后的德国的政府首脑。
description.en: Otto von Bismarck served for a long time as the head of government of Prussia and later the unified Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在威廉一世担任普鲁士国王和德意志皇帝期间，被其任命为首相，两人形成了十分特别的牢固关系。
description.en: During Wilhelm I's reign as King of Prussia and German Emperor, Bismarck was appointed as his Minister President, and the two formed a particularly strong bond.

description.zh-cn: 在腓特烈三世短暂的99天统治期间，俾斯麦继续担任首相。
description.en: During Frederick III's brief 99-day reign, Bismarck continued to serve as Chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 在威廉二世执政初期担任首相，后因分歧被其解职。
description.en: Served as Chancellor during the early years of Wilhelm II's reign, but was later dismissed due to disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 因政策分歧和权力斗争，年少气盛的威廉二世解除了俾斯麦的首相职务，迫使其下野。
description.en: Due to policy disagreements and power struggles, the young and ambitious Wilhelm II dismissed Bismarck from his position as Chancellor, forcing him into retirement.

description.zh-cn: 列奥·冯·卡普里维接替俾斯麦担任德意志帝国首相。
description.en: Leo von Caprivi succeeded Bismarck as Chancellor of the German Empire.

description.zh-cn: 通过三场统一战争（普丹、普奥、普法战争），主导并完成了德意志的统一。
description.en: Orchestrated and completed the unification of Germany through three wars of unification (Second Schleswig, Austro-Prussian, and Franco-Prussian).

description.zh-cn: 就石勒苏益格和荷尔斯泰因问题制造与丹麦的争端，并联合奥地利发动战争。
description.en: Created a dispute with Denmark over Schleswig and Holstein and launched a war in alliance with Austria.

description.zh-cn: 在普丹战争中与奥地利联合击败丹麦，逼使其放弃石勒苏益格和荷尔斯泰因。
description.en: In the Second Schleswig War, allied with Austria to defeat Denmark, forcing it to cede Schleswig and Holstein.

description.zh-cn: 为将奥地利排除出德意志邦联，通过外交手段孤立奥地利后，策划并发动了普奥战争。
description.en: To exclude Austria from the German Confederation, he diplomatically isolated Austria and then planned and initiated the Austro-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 在普奥战争中击败奥地利，将其势力逐出德意志邦联，为德国统一铺平了道路。
description.en: Defeated Austria in the Austro-Prussian War, expelling its influence from the German Confederation and paving the way for German unification.

description.zh-cn: 以西班牙王位继承问题制造争端，逼使法国对普鲁士宣战，以团结德意志民族，完成统一大业。
description.en: Used the Spanish succession issue to provoke a dispute, compelling France to declare war on Prussia, thereby uniting the German nation to complete the unification.

description.zh-cn: 在普法战争中击败法国，促成德国统一，并夺取阿尔萨斯和洛林。
description.en: Defeated France in the Franco-Prussian War, leading to German unification and the annexation of Alsace-Lorraine.

description.zh-cn: 在色当会战中战胜法军，导致拿破仑三世投降。
description.en: Defeated the French army at the Battle of Sedan, leading to the surrender of Napoleon III.

description.zh-cn: 普法战争的胜利直接促成了德意志帝国的成立。
description.en: The victory in the Franco-Prussian War directly led to the proclamation of the German Empire.

description.zh-cn: 与意大利签订攻守同盟条约，在普奥战争中共同对奥地利作战。
description.en: Signed an offensive and defensive alliance treaty with Italy to fight together against Austria in the Austro-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 为孤立法国，与奥匈帝国、俄罗斯帝国缔结“三帝同盟”。
description.en: To isolate France, he formed the 'League of the Three Emperors' with Austria-Hungary and the Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 在俄国退出三帝同盟后，随即与奥匈帝国重订盟约，建立德奥同盟。
description.en: After Russia's withdrawal from the League of the Three Emperors, he promptly renegotiated an alliance with Austria-Hungary, establishing the Dual Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 在俄土战争后主持柏林会议，协调欧洲大国纷争，自称“诚实经纪人”。
description.en: After the Russo-Turkish War, he presided over the Congress of Berlin to mediate disputes among European great powers, calling himself an 'honest broker'.

description.zh-cn: 柏林会议的结果使俄国在巴尔干地区的扩张受阻，成为大输家，导致德俄关系恶化。
description.en: The outcome of the Congress of Berlin thwarted Russia's expansion in the Balkans, making it a major loser and causing a deterioration in German-Russian relations.
